gui.xaero_requires_reload: 이 옵션을 적용하려면 월드맵을 다시 불러와야 합니다.
gui.xaero_map_selection_box:
수동 - 세계나 차원을 전환할 때마다 세계 지도를 선택하고 확인하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다. 
 
 월드 스폰 - 게임 클라이언트가 알고 있는 월드 스폰 지점을 기준으로 월드 맵이 자동으로 선택되고 확인됩니다. 서버가 사용자 지정 기능을 위해 바닐라 나침반 아이템을 사용하고 있다면 깨질 수 있습니다. 
 
 싱글 - 각 차원에는 자동으로 확인되는 단일 세계 지도가 있습니다. 단일 세계를 가진 간단한 서버에 유용합니다. 
 
 서버 - 이 자동 모드를 사용하기 위해 서버에 세계 지도 모드를 설치합니다.
gui.xaero_wm_box_ignore_heightmaps: 일부 서버는 월드 높이 맵에 사용자 정의 값을 넣어 잘못된 맵 렌더링을 유발할 수 있습니다. 가끔은 중간에 모드가 많은 싱글플레이어 월드에서도 발생할 수 있습니다. 이 옵션은 성능을 조금 희생하면서 이러한 문제를 해결해 줍니다. 필요하지 않다면 사용하지 마세요. 옵션을 전환한 후 월드를 다시 들어가야 합니다! 저장은 월드/서버별로 이루어지며, 설정 프로필의 일부는 아닙니다.
gui.xaero_wm_error_loading_properties: 서버 월드맵 속성 로딩 오류. 다시 시도해 주세요.
gui.xaero_mw_server_box: 지도 선택은 서버에 의해 자동으로 제어됩니다. XaeroWorldMap 디렉토리 내 서버별 설정에서 "ignoreServerLevelId"를 사용하여 이 기능을 비활성화할 수 있습니다.
gui.xaero_box_controls:
조작 방법 
 
 클릭 후 드래그하여 지도를 이동합니다. 
 마우스 휠을 돌려 확대/축소합니다. (CTRL 키로 정밀 조절) 
 지도를 우클릭하면 유용한 단축 메뉴가 표시됩니다. 
 일부 버튼의 추가 단축키는 툴팁에서 확인할 수 있습니다. 
 
 지도 요소(예: 웨이포인트)를 우클릭하여 설정을 변경합니다. 
 %1$s여기를 클릭해 단축키 설정을 변경하세요.
gui.xaero_box_controls_minimap:
§2%s§r: 새로운 웨이포인트를 생성합니다. 
 §2%s§r: 빠른 임시 웨이포인트를 생성합니다. 
 §2%s§r: 웨이포인트 세트를 전환합니다. 
 §2%s§r: 모든 웨이포인트 세트 표시 여부를 토글합니다. 
 §2%s§r: 전체 웨이포인트 메뉴를 엽니다.
gui.xaero_box_controls_pac: §2%s§r: 파티 및 영토 설정 메뉴를 엽니다.
gui.xaero_export_confirm_2: 게임이 작업 중일 때 일시적으로 동작이 멈출 수 있습니다.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_minimap_required: 웨이포인트 기능은 Xaero's Minimap 모드가 필요합니다!
gui.xaero_no_world_map_item_message: 지도를 사용하려면 다음 아이템을 핫바에 소지하거나 장착해야 합니다:
gui.xaero_current_map_locked1: 현재 선택된 지도가 다른 프로세스(마인크래프트 클라이언트)에서 사용 중입니다.
gui.xaero_current_map_locked2: 이 서버의 다른 지도를 선택하십시오 (왼쪽 하단 아이콘).
gui.xaero_wm_box_detect_ambiguous_y: A single pixel on the map can contain multiple transparent layers and an opaque block under them. In older non-cache map data files, only the Y level (height) of the opaque block is stored in such cases, which often makes it unsafe to blindly teleport to the stored Y coordinate. When this setting is ON, the mod treats such map pixels as it would undiscovered chunks. It defaults to 2D waypoints and disables direct teleportation to such pixels. Disable this at your own risk!
gui.xaero_box_closing_menu_when_hopping: Closing the menu when hopping to a waypoint (left-clicking in the menu)
gui.xaero_box_not_closing_menu_when_hopp: Not closing the menu when hopping to a waypoint (left-clicking in the menu)
gui.xaero_wm_box_adjust_height_for_carpe: Subtract 1 from the height value for short carpetlike blocks, e.g. carpet, 1-layer snow, lilypad etc. This prevents such blocks from causing harsh shading on the map like a full block. Waypoints and teleportation over these blocks should make more sense too.
gui.xaero_box_only_current_map_waypoints: Displaying only the waypoints bound to the current world map, even if another waypoint sub-world is selected for the minimap using the full waypoint menu.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_selected_by_mini: Displaying waypoints from the same waypoint sub-world as you are viewing in game and on the minimap. The sub-world can be switched in the full waypoint menu.
gui.xaero_wm_box_arrow_color: 플레이어의 위치와 방향을 나타내는 화살표의 색상.
gui.xaero_box_minimap_radar: %s Minimap entity radar is displayed (requires Xaero's Minimap)
gui.xaero_box_no_minimap_radar: %s Minimap entity radar is not displayed
gui.xaero_wm_toggle_minimap_radar: Toggle Minimap Radar On World Map
gui.xaero_box_players_pac_required: 파티 플레이어 메뉴 기능은 Open Parties and Claims 모드가 필요합니다!
gui.xaero_box_claims_pac_required: 청크 클레임 기능은 Open Parties and Claims 모드가 필요합니다!
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_player_teleport_com: The chat command used on this world/server to teleport you to other players on the map when Open Parties and Claims is installed.
gui.xaero_wm_box_player_teleport_command: The chat command used on this world/server to teleport you to tracked players on the map (not regular radar). Stored per world/server, not part of the config profile.
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_claims: Display chunk claims from the Open Parties and Claims mod as a colored overlay.
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_claims_border_opaci: The opacity of the chunk claims overlay border color. Chunk claims require the Open Parties and Claims mod.
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_claims_fill_opacity: The opacity of the chunk claims overlay fill color. Chunk claims require the Open Parties and Claims mod.
gui.xaero_wm_teleport_command_waypoints_: Waypoint teleportation is configured by the minimap.
gui.xaero_wm_teleport_allowed_tooltip: Whether right-click map teleportation is allowed. Waypoint teleportation is configured separately in the full waypoint menu options.
gui.xaero_wm_option_requires_minimap: This option requires the Xaero's Minimap mod.
gui.xaero_wm_option_requires_ingame: This option requires you to be in game.
gui.xaero_wm_settings_not_found: No matching entries found for your input!
gui.xaero_wm_reset_message: Are you sure you would like to restore the default settings?
gui.xaero_wm_partial_y_teleportation: Use Y With Partial When TP
gui.xaero_wm_box_partial_y_teleportation: When teleporting to a map location, offset the Y coordinate by 0.5 to avoid falling through carpet-like blocks into the void. Otherwise, the integer Y coordinate is used.
gui.xaero_box_update_chunks: Update chunks on the non-world-save maps (multiplayer).
gui.xaero_box_load_chunks: Add new chunks to the non-world-save maps (multiplayer).
gui.xaero_wm_box_legible_cave_maps: Use depth-based lighting in cave mode instead of actual block lighting, making it easier to mentally separate the different cave layers.
gui.xaero_wm_box_cave_mode_type:
The cave mode type to use when cave mode is enabled. 
 
 OFF - display above ground even when cave mode is automatically or manually enabled (same as old world map versions without cave mode) 
 Layered - separate cave maps into multiple layers depending on the used top Y 
 Full - ignore the used top Y, use a single layer for cave maps and map everything from the world top to the world bottom
gui.xaero_wm_box_default_cave_mode_type: The default cave mode type assigned to dimensions visited for the first time in a world/server. You can read more about cave mode types by clicking the cave mode icon on the map screen.
gui.xaero_box_auto_cave_mode:
How the mod should determine the "auto" top Y when viewing the full screen map. The ceiling size refers to the size of a square ceiling of solid blocks that has to be detected above you to activate the cave mode. The solid blocks don't have to be on the same Y level. 
 
 Minimap - if installed, match the minimap mod's cave mode, otherwise use the ceiling size 3x3
gui.xaero_wm_box_cave_mode_toggle_timer: The minimum time to wait between toggles of cave mode to prevent flickering when quickly switching between being under blocks and not. This only applies when "Auto Cave Mode" isn't redirecting to the minimap mod. The latest minimap mod has a separate setting for this as well.
gui.xaero_wm_box_biome_blending: 맵 상의 모든 블록에 대해 여러 블록에 대한 생물 군계 색상을 샘플링하여 생물 군계 색상 가장자리를 부드럽게 처리합니다. 이를 끄면 생물 군계 색상 계산이 바닐라보다 훨씬 더 무거울 때 성능을 크게 향상시킬 수 있습니다.
gui.xaero_png_result_not_prepared: Can't export just yet! The world map has not been prepared yet.
gui.xaero_png_result_too_big: The exported area is way too big to scale down! Please make a smaller selection.
gui.xaero_png_result_image_too_big: The image size is beyond what's possible to store in a BufferedImage!
gui.xaero_png_result_out_of_memory: The export failed because the Java heap ran out of memory! Please try again or allocate more memory.
gui.xaero_png_result_bad_fbo: The export failed because the mod failed to create an OpenGL framebuffer.
gui.xaero_png_result_io_exception: The export failed because of an IO exception! Please try again. The full exception has been logged.
gui.xaero_export_screen_exporting: 내보내는 중... Will temporarily appear frozen. Might take a while!
gui.xaero_box_export_option_full: Export the whole map even if you've made a map selection.
gui.xaero_box_export_option_multiple_ima: Export the map as multiple unscaled images no matter how big it is. This does not have the same memory limitations as a single image.
gui.xaero_box_export_option_nighttime: Export the map with nighttime lighting. This doesn't affect cave mode maps.
gui.xaero_box_export_option_scale_down_s:
The size, in regions, of a square image equivalent to the resolution that a large exported map will be scaled down to if necessary. For example, 20x20 stands for 400 regions, 512x512 blocks/pixels each. The resulting image doesn't have to be a square. 10x40 is also 400 regions. 
 
 Your computer or the Java heap size might not be able to handle higher export resolutions.
gui.xaero_box_export_option_highlights: Export the map with all currently enabled highlights (e.g. claims) applied to the map. When exporting the full map, highlights very far from your discovered map won't be included.
gui.xaero_box_map_writing_distance: The maximum X and Z distance in chunks at which chunks can be loaded or updated on a non-world-save map. For the "Unlimited" option, go all the way to the left. World save maps always generate within your render distance
gui.xaero_box_full_reload: Reload all regions on the map without having to manually view them. The reloading process will work in the background and turn off when it's done. It is important to note that going to another dimension will pause it until you come back and changing maps will fully cancel it.
gui.xaero_box_full_resave: Reload and resave all regions on the map without having to manually visit them. World save maps will be converted into normal map data saved to a separate map instance "Converted World Save", stored in the folder "cm$converted", which can be transferred to multiplayer map instances for the same world, using file manager. The reloading process will work in the background and turn off when it's done. It is important to note that going to another dimension will pause it until you come back and changing maps will fully cancel it.
gui.xaero_full_reload_in_progress: 전체 지도를 다시 불러오는 중 입니다...
gui.xaero_box_reload_viewed_regions: 화면에 표시되는 모든 지역을 한 번씩 다시 불러옵니다.
gui.xaero_unknown_dimension_type1: 현재 알 수 없는 차원 유형!
gui.xaero_unknown_dimension_type2: 맵 기능이 제한됩니다. 차원을 한 번 방문하면 도움이 될 수 있습니다.
gui.xaero_wm_teleport_not_connected: You are trying to teleport to a map that is not connected to the current confirmed/auto one. If you are sure that this map is from your current sub-server/world save, then you can enable teleportation by adding a connection in the map selection screen -> Connect. But beware, if you connect unrelated maps and teleport, then there is a good chance you will suffocate in a block or die from fall damage, so be careful and connect only the right ones.
gui.xaero_wm_teleport_never_confirmed: You cannot teleport yet because you have not yet confirmed a single map in your current dimension. Please confirm a map in your current dimension or change map selection type to an automatic one.
gui.xaero_dimension_toggle_button: §2%s§r 차원 전환 (shift 키를 누르고 있으면 반대로 전환)
gui.xaero_wm_box_cave_mode_allowed: Cave mode on the full screen world map. It's a mapping mode that can go deeper than the surface blocks, mainly to display underground caves and interiors of buildings. Cave mode is usually enabled automatically (see "Auto Cave Mode"), but can also be enabled manually on the world map screen.
gui.xaero_wm_box_cave_mode_allowed_dimen: A list of dimension IDs, separated by comas, where cave mode should work on the full screen world map. If the list is empty (just []), cave mode works in every dimension.
gui.xaero_world_map_config_redirect_fair: 서버의 페어-플레이 모드 강화로 인해 비활성화됨!
gui.xaero_wm_box_map_teleport_command: 이 월드/서버에서 지도의 위치로 텔레포트하기 위해 사용되는 채팅 명령어입니다. 월드/서버별로 저장되며, 설정 프로필의 일부는 아닙니다.
gui.xaero_box_map_item: 전체화면 월드맵을 작동시키기 위해 핫바에 필요한 아이템의 ID입니다. 필요하지 않다면 "-"로 설정하세요.
gui.xaero_wm_box_display_minimap_radar: 전체화면 지도에 미니맵 레이더를 표시합니다. Xaero's Minimap 모드가 설치되어 있어야 작동합니다.
gui.xaero_wm_reset_config_profile_defaul: 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다! 프로필이 아닌 설정 옵션은 영향을 받지 않습니다.
